Title: Delver's Call: Spiral Weave
Description:
A lot of us survivors have heard stories about the Spiral Weave. Seems like it's a place where the nerubians have some heavy military operations going on.

Taking the fight to them would help put a serious dent in the nerubians' war plans.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Spiral Weave delve on any difficulty
CompletionText: You're going into the heart of a nerubian military base. Be careful.
RewardText: You did it! That should give our forces on the surface a bit of a reprieve.

Objectives.Text: The Spiral Weave delve completed on any difficulty
